approveRedeem(uint256,bytes).notice: Approves a request to redeem a token

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Allows this redemption contract to receive ERC721 from approved addresses only

rejectRedeem(uint256).notice: Rejects a request to redeem a token

requestToken(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: Requests a token to be transfered to the sender
